column4: In Blood Mode, you sacrifice willing participants to the gods. Each participant has their own degree of enthusiasm indicated by their color and consent percentage.
column5: Only sacrifice those participants that consent to being sacrificed. If you sacrifice a participant who really isn't feeling it, as indicated by their coloring and exclamation marks, they will negatively affect other participants in the queue.
column6: The gods are impatient for blood and must have a continual flow in order to remain satiated. If the blood flow runs dry as indicated by the blood meter running in the background, the gods will be displeased and the game will end.
column7: Consensual sacrifices please the gods and add blood to your meter, providing you with more time. Less consensual sacrifices offend the gods and cost you blood. If the blood meter amount exceeds the height of the screen, blood will be deposited into yourBlood Bank for emergency use if you run out. These deposits are represented by containers that appear in your inventory in the top left.
column8: If the rate of consensual sacrifices exceeds 9 per second, the gods will grant you a Subcontractor to sacrifice 5 participants automatically at timed intervals. These can also be found in your inventory represented through the club icon.
column9: Use the right mouse button to swap to Broker Mode. Click the temple to sacrifice a participant. After the first sacrifice, the game will begin.

column4: Participants are fickle beasts and easily influenced by their peers. If presented with less consenting or non-consenting participants, switch to Broker Mode with right-click or the space bar.
column5: In Broker Mode, you can rearrange participants and positively influence them. Surround those stingy participants with more enthusiastic neighbors in order to convince them to give blood. Colored arrows indicate if their consent level is increasing or decreasing.
column6: Participants appreciate friendliness from their shepherds. If you find a stingy participant in Broker Mode, unwilling to part with their blood, simply wave your club (cursor) at them until they are excited into granting their consent. Waving your club continuously will cause it to grow, allowing others to share in the excitement.
column7: Participants can also be quickly tossed with a flick of the wrist. Note that the first and last participants cannot be tossed.
column8: Don't worry if you can't sacrifice a participant at any given moment. With a little effort on your part, all participants can ultimately be sacrificed.

column4: Youâ€™ve reached the organ Extraction Minigame because you sacrificed a special glowing participant. Every so often, a special glowing participant will appear. Exploit this opening before their timer runs out to trigger the minigame.
column5: To play the minigame, first spread out all five fingers and place them down on the keyboard at once. This will trigger the claw's descent. Once lowered into position, tighten your grip, sliding your fingers together to more closely positioned keys. Hang on while the claw rises out of the cavity!
column6: If you're lucky, you will have extracted an organ or two. If so, the claw will rotate to a basket on the side. When the claw is positioned over the basket, release your fingers to drop the organ into the basket. The participants rejoice at the spectacle you have presented and eagerly await their own opportunity at the altar.
column7: Extracted organs are worth differing values. The gods value the heart most of all, followed by the lungs, stomach and intestines.

column4: After gaining the gods' confidence, they encourage your participation in the blood <color=#ff2d2d><align="center"><font="Martyric SDF">Market</font></align></color>, where you can exchange your blood trust in pursuit of sustainable long-term success. Items can be exchanged in the bottom left hand corner of your screen.
column5: Different item types are unlocked for purchase at certain sacrifice thresholds. Your inventory is limited to 7 items of a specific type at a time. Once you have filled your inventory with an item type, you will be able to purchase the more advanced item for a discounted price.
column6:
Blood Bank Deposit
Blood bank deposits buy the gods' patience, allowing you more time to get the blood flowing.

Unlocked after 100 sacrifices.
column7:
Subcontractor
Subcontractors allow you to automatically sacrifice participants in timed intervals, up to five per club icon.

Unlocked after 200 sacrifices.
column8:
Influencers
An influencer can be hired to positively or negatively influence all those that fall within their sphere of influence. Upon hiring an influencer, they are placed at the end of your queue. Drag influencers along the queue to spread their influence.

Unlocked after 600 sacrifices.
column9:
"Say Yes!" Consent Campaign
The "Say Yes!" Consent Campaign markets the idea of consent to the entire queue, educating the public on the benefits of sacrifice.

Unlocked after 1000 sacrifices.
